languages.text: "Пусть мерзость этого сквернавца не выделяет его в вашем сердце среди прочих его гнусных сородичей. Поступить так надо с каждым".
"Draw no distinction in your heart between this vile abomination and his equally foul kin. Every one of his breed deserves the same fate."
languages.original_text: "Пусть мерзость этого сквернавца не выделяет его в вашем сердце среди прочих его гнусных сородичей. Поступить так надо с каждым".

traits.locale_text: "Draw no distinction in your heart between this vile abomination and his equally foul kin. Every one of his breed deserves the same fate."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Draw no distinction in your heart between this vile abomination and his equally foul kin. Every one of his breed deserves the same fate."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “不必在心里把这个可憎的家伙和他的同族区别开来。他们都是同样的邪恶之物，他的每个族人都该落得同样的下场。”
languages.original_text: "Draw no distinction in your heart between this vile abomination and his equally foul kin. Every one of his breed deserves the same fate."

traits.locale_text: “不必在心里把这个可憎的家伙和他的同族区别开来。他们都是同样的邪恶之物，他的每个族人都该落得同样的下场。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Ne faites pas de distinction entre cette abomination et sa cousine tout aussi abjecte. Tous ceux de cette espèce devraient finir comme lui. Sans exception. »
languages.original_text: "Draw no distinction in your heart between this vile abomination and his equally foul kin. Every one of his breed deserves the same fate."

traits.locale_text: « Ne faites pas de distinction entre cette abomination et sa cousine tout aussi abjecte. Tous ceux de cette espèce devraient finir comme lui. Sans exception. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «No haga distinciones en su corazón entre esa vil abominación y su inmunda parentela. Toda su aborrecible estirpe merece el mismo sino».
languages.original_text: "Draw no distinction in your heart between this vile abomination and his equally foul kin. Every one of his breed deserves the same fate."

traits.locale_text: «No haga distinciones en su corazón entre esa vil abominación y su inmunda parentela. Toda su aborrecible estirpe merece el mismo sino».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「この卑劣漢と、同じく汚らわしい奴の同胞とを内心で区別するな。あの種族は誰だろうと、同じ運命がお似合いだ」
languages.original_text: "Draw no distinction in your heart between this vile abomination and his equally foul kin. Every one of his breed deserves the same fate."

traits.locale_text: 「この卑劣漢と、同じく汚らわしい奴の同胞とを内心で区別するな。あの種族は誰だろうと、同じ運命がお似合いだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Unterscheidet in Eurem Herzen nicht zwischen dieser schändlichen Abscheulichkeit und seinen ebenso widerwärtigen Verwandten. Jeder Angehörige seiner Spezies verdient dasselbe Schicksal."
languages.original_text: "Draw no distinction in your heart between this vile abomination and his equally foul kin. Every one of his breed deserves the same fate."

traits.locale_text: "Unterscheidet in Eurem Herzen nicht zwischen dieser schändlichen Abscheulichkeit und seinen ebenso widerwärtigen Verwandten. Jeder Angehörige seiner Spezies verdient dasselbe Schicksal."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Draw no distinction in your heart between this vile abomination and his equally foul kin. Every one of his breed deserves the same fate."

languages.text: "Bu kötü garabetle kendisi kadar pislik soyu arasında hiçbir fark yok. Onun türünden olanların her biri, aynı kaderi paylaşmayı hak ediyor."
languages.original_text: "Draw no distinction in your heart between this vile abomination and his equally foul kin. Every one of his breed deserves the same fate."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kötü garabetle kendisi kadar pislik soyu arasında bir fark yok. Onun türünden olanların her biri aynı kaderi paylaşmayı hak ediyor."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
